question: What is the theme of the 2019 edition of World Tourism Day (WTD)?
option4: Tourism: Responding to the Challenge of Climate Change
explanation: The World Tourism Day (WTD) is observed every year on 27th of September to create awareness on the role of tourism among the international community and to demonstrate how it affects social, cultural, political and economic values worldwide. The 2019 theme is \"Tourism and Jobs: A Better Future for All\".
